text: The Greatest Show on Earth is a 1952 movie. Its setting is the Ringling Bros. and Barnum & Bailey Circus. It stars Betty Hutton, Cornel Wilde, and Charlton Heston. It was produced, directed, and narrated by Cecil B. DeMille. It won the Academy Award for Best Picture. It was a box office hit. Category:1952 movies Category:1950s epic movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Cecil B. DeMille Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in circuses
title: The Greatest Show on Earth
